publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2426# Helen Eadie: BT plc Sales Marketing Policy-That the Parliament notes newspaper reports alleging that British Telecommunications plc has issued instructions to employees not to undertake sales marketing in Dundee and Kelty on the grounds that these areas are not "posh" enough; is concerned at the stigma this creates for communities, and condemns any companies conducting their business in a way that causes harm and offence to communities across Scotland. Supported by: Mr John McAllion*
